title: Dear Richard Madeley: 'My close friend’s started dating a terrible poet'
text:
Dear Richard

I have a friend who I have known for 30 years, and I love her to bits. However, something unholy threatens our friendship. The unwelcome blot on the landscape is her new partner. A highly educated, literate man in his 50s, he has a master’s in poetry. Good luck to him. The trouble is, we are regularly reminded of the fact. The worst time was when we were together as a foursome in a restaurant for her birthday. He stood up at the table to declaim a poem about how they were “first friends and then lovers” and the future was an “exciting journey of their discovery of each other”.
